content: ***something to keep you warm this holiday season *** *simple beanies are my favorite and this one sure is a keeper with this beanie you will be happy and warm even during the coldest of winters extra points for the fact that this one is also teen approved * *oak beanie is knitted from the brim up in delicious pencil roving bulky weight yarn * **yarn ** 1 1 2 skein s of unelma by vuonue 100% lambs wool pencil roving 145 yds 130 m / 100 g approx 100 130 170 yds / 90 120 155 m of bulky weight yarn sample knitted in color natural black **finished measurements ** 16 17½ 19 / 40 44 48 cm in circumference at brim and 10 / 25 cm long
